attributes.action: Ban fireworks / only allow them at professional displays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fireworks are a great danger and there are too many idiots out there exploring these dangers. Last night one got posted through my neighbours letter box! This evening I am sitting here alone while my 4 yr old sleeps, terrified that they are going to do it to me! Only a few weeks ago, somebody smashed my cousin's car window and then put a firework inside and blew the car up! They are a great danger and should be banned or only allowed at controlled, professional displays.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
